item.title: Intention Vs Action - Tool to prioritise yourself
item.description: ​ Whenever we are hurt/harmed or have been at end of an unsatisfying or unfavourable situation, we replay the situation and try to judge each and every action, of ourselves and of others. There are many tools to understand and analyse your/others' actions. A tool that has helped me to judge these situations is “Intention Vs Action”. ​ In the world we live in, where there is constant propaganda and lies, intentions mean very little and actions are the deciding factors.
